String.Source: What skills do you possess?
String.Dest: What skills do you possess?

String.Source: Like any dragon slayer, my preferred weapon is the bow.
String.Dest: Like any dragon slayer, my preferred weapon is the bow.

String.Source: What skills do you possess?
String.Dest: What skills do you possess?

String.Source: The one I use is enchanted with fire, and every arrow burns with the rage of my homeland.
String.Dest: The one I use is enchanted with fire, and every arrow burns with the rage of my homeland.

String.Source: Just remember, rest and relaxation is an important part of battle preparation.
String.Dest: Just remember, rest and relaxation is an important part of battle preparation.

String.Source: And we have done plenty of that already. But if that is how you prepare, so be it. I will keep my eyes and arrows trained to the sky.
String.Dest: And we have done plenty of that already. But if that is how you prepare, so be it. I will keep my eyes and arrows trained to the sky.

String.Source: Well, battle strategy aside, as a mortal, you must have other needs and desires.
String.Dest: Well, battle strategy aside, as a mortal, you must have other needs and desires.

String.Source: What does it matter? Do you wish to know my favorite color? My favorite drink? The answer is the same for both. Dragon's blood.
String.Dest: What does it matter? Do you wish to know my favorite color? My favorite drink? The answer is the same for both. Dragon's blood.

String.Source: Well, battle strategy aside, as a mortal, you must have other needs and desires.
String.Dest: Well, battle strategy aside, as a mortal, you must have other needs and desires.

String.Source: Now let's get moving.
String.Dest: Now let's get moving.

String.Source: I'm just trying to figure out why you're so goddamn angry.
String.Dest: I'm just trying to figure out why you're so goddamn angry.

String.Source: I never chose to be this way. I would be more than happy to spend my days like a drunken lout.
String.Dest: I never chose to be this way. I would be more than happy to spend my days like a drunken lout.

String.Source: I'm just trying to figure out why you're so goddamn angry.
String.Dest: I'm just trying to figure out why you're so goddamn angry.

String.Source: But the times we live in, it makes warriors out of even the heartiest of fools.
String.Dest: But the times we live in, it makes warriors out of even the heartiest of fools.

String.Source: I've worked with many archers, and few were as pleasant as your company.
String.Dest: I've worked with many archers, and few were as pleasant as your company.

String.Source: If my company is what you will remember me by, then clearly I have left the wrong impression.
String.Dest: If my company is what you will remember me by, then clearly I have left the wrong impression.

String.Source: I know our strategy. I just want to make sure you know it.
String.Dest: I know our strategy. I just want to make sure you know it.

String.Source: When I draw my arrow, be sure to move out of its path. If you want to live, that's all you need to know.
String.Dest: When I draw my arrow, be sure to move out of its path. If you want to live, that's all you need to know.

String.Source: I meant get to know each other on a personal level.
String.Dest: I meant get to know each other on a personal level.

String.Source: There is no need. We are professionals. Unless I have misjudged you, how we get along has no bearing on our ability to kill our enemies.
String.Dest: There is no need. We are professionals. Unless I have misjudged you, how we get along has no bearing on our ability to kill our enemies.

String.Source: I think it's time we got to know each other better.
String.Dest: I think it's time we got to know each other better.

String.Source: Why? Have you never worked with an archer before? Our strategy should be clear.
String.Dest: Why? Have you never worked with an archer before? Our strategy should be clear.

String.Source: I think it's time we got to know each other better.
String.Dest: I think it's time we got to know each other better.

String.Source: Is there any part of you that enjoys the hunt?
String.Dest: Is there any part of you that enjoys the hunt?

String.Source: If you are asking whether I find it satisfying, then yes. I take pleasure in the chase, but I don't chase for pleasure.
String.Dest: If you are asking whether I find it satisfying, then yes. I take pleasure in the chase, but I don't chase for pleasure.

String.Source: I think it's time we got to know each other better.
String.Dest: I think it's time we got to know each other better.

String.Source: Is there any part of you that enjoys the hunt?
String.Dest: Is there any part of you that enjoys the hunt?

String.Source: When you track wild game, the only meaningful goal is to fend off starvation.
String.Dest: When you track wild game, the only meaningful goal is to fend off starvation.

String.Source: I think it's time we got to know each other better.
String.Dest: I think it's time we got to know each other better.

String.Source: Is there any part of you that enjoys the hunt?
String.Dest: Is there any part of you that enjoys the hunt?

String.Source: The thrill of the hunt, and the savoring of the feast, all of that is secondary.
String.Dest: The thrill of the hunt, and the savoring of the feast, all of that is secondary.

String.Source: What brings you here?
String.Dest: 什么风把你吹来了?

String.Source: I was headed east to Cradlecrush when I came across this shrine. Then I saw you.
String.Dest: I was headed east to Cradlecrush when I came across this shrine. Then I saw you.

String.Source: What brings you here?
String.Dest: 什么风把你吹来了?

String.Source: My previous companion didn't make it past Guldun Rock. Maybe you'll fare better.
String.Dest: My previous companion didn't make it past Guldun Rock. Maybe you'll fare better.

String.Source: Why are you passing through Giant camps?
String.Dest: Why are you passing through Giant camps?

String.Source: The camps serve as bait. Dragons have big appetites, and mammoths are a heavy meal.
String.Dest: The camps serve as bait. Dragons have big appetites, and mammoths are a heavy meal.

String.Source: Why are you passing through Giant camps?
String.Dest: Why are you passing through Giant camps?

String.Source: It's ironic, really. A dragon's strength comes from his compulsion to dominate, his desire to kill. Yet it's that very hunger that makes them weak.
String.Dest: It's ironic, really. A dragon's strength comes from his compulsion to dominate, his desire to kill. Yet it's that very hunger that makes them weak.

String.Source: Dragons and mortals can co-exist.
String.Dest: Dragons and mortals can co-exist.

String.Source: And people think I should remain silent, when fools like you are allowed to speak.
String.Dest: And people think I should remain silent, when fools like you are allowed to speak.

String.Source: You'd be doing them a favor. I find the taste of ash to be rather pleasant.
String.Dest: You'd be doing them a favor. I find the taste of ash to be rather pleasant.

String.Source: Then perhaps you won't mind when this land is torn asunder.
String.Dest: Then perhaps you won't mind when this land is torn asunder.

String.Source: You'd be doing them a favor. I find the taste of ash to be rather pleasant.
String.Dest: You'd be doing them a favor. I find the taste of ash to be rather pleasant.

String.Source: If you wish to stand by and doing nothing, than that is your choice. Just don't get in my way.
String.Dest: If you wish to stand by and doing nothing, than that is your choice. Just don't get in my way.

String.Source: I too detest the dragon menace. Let us be rid of them once and for all.
String.Dest: I too detest the dragon menace. Let us be rid of them once and for all.

String.Source: Then you would do well to recognize them in all their forms. Bow to no dragon, show them no mercy, let the land drink their blood.
String.Dest: Then you would do well to recognize them in all their forms. Bow to no dragon, show them no mercy, let the land drink their blood.

String.Source: It's madness to hunt dragons by your lonesome.
String.Dest: It's madness to hunt dragons by your lonesome.

String.Source: The world is mad. You would be crazy to think otherwise.
String.Dest: The world is mad. You would be crazy to think otherwise.

String.Source: Are you saying you hunt dragons?
String.Dest: Are you saying you hunt dragons?

String.Source: Why not? Some may be content letting this world go to ash, and living off the remains.
String.Dest: Why not? Some may be content letting this world go to ash, and living off the remains.

String.Source: Are you saying you hunt dragons?
String.Dest: Are you saying you hunt dragons?

String.Source: But I say we fight fire with fire. I say they're the ones who'll burn.
String.Dest: But I say we fight fire with fire. I say they're the ones who'll burn.

String.Source: You mentioned you were from Morrowind. Why did you come to Skyrim?
String.Dest: You mentioned you were from Morrowind. Why did you come to Skyrim?

String.Source: Fire. When it poured down the neck of the Red Mountain, it sent my ancestors west.
String.Dest: Fire. When it poured down the neck of the Red Mountain, it sent my ancestors west.

String.Source: You mentioned you were from Morrowind. Why did you come to Skyrim?
String.Dest: You mentioned you were from Morrowind. Why did you come to Skyrim?

String.Source: When it burned in the heart of the Stormcloaks, I wanted no part of their Gray Quarter.
String.Dest: When it burned in the heart of the Stormcloaks, I wanted no part of their Gray Quarter.

String.Source: You mentioned you were from Morrowind. Why did you come to Skyrim?
String.Dest: You mentioned you were from Morrowind. Why did you come to Skyrim?

String.Source: And now it stirs in the maw of the dragons, their very breath a storm. But I will make sure all their words turn to ash.
String.Dest: And now it stirs in the maw of the dragons, their very breath a storm. But I will make sure all their words turn to ash.

String.Source: Any word on dragon sightings?
String.Dest: Any word on dragon sightings?

String.Source: This Jarl's decree mentions a dragon sighting.
String.Dest: This Jarl's decree mentions a dragon sighting.

String.Source: Then let's hope for the Jarl's sake he isn't wasting our time, for the fire I breathe burns hotter than any beast.
String.Dest: Then let's hope for the Jarl's sake he isn't wasting our time, for the fire I breathe burns hotter than any beast.

String.Source: Any word on dragon sightings?
String.Dest: Any word on dragon sightings?

String.Source: The townsfolk here are all fools and liars. There are either no dragons or hundreds of them, depending on whom you ask.
String.Dest: The townsfolk here are all fools and liars. There are either no dragons or hundreds of them, depending on whom you ask.

String.Source: Any word on dragon sightings?
String.Dest: Any word on dragon sightings?

String.Source: Perhaps I'll have more luck if I follow your lead instead. What say you?
String.Dest: Perhaps I'll have more luck if I follow your lead instead. What say you?

String.Source: I can help you slay this dragon.
String.Dest: I can help you slay this dragon.

String.Source: Normally I'd laugh at such a suggestion, but for some reason I'm inclined to believe you. Interesting.
String.Dest: Normally I'd laugh at such a suggestion, but for some reason I'm inclined to believe you. Interesting.

String.Source: I can help you slay this dragon.
String.Dest: I can help you slay this dragon.

String.Source: All right. If you're that confident, then let's head on over to Cradlecrush Rock, and you can prove your bravado is warranted.
String.Dest: All right. If you're that confident, then let's head on over to Cradlecrush Rock, and you can prove your bravado is warranted.

String.Source: What problem do you have with Talos, stranger?
String.Dest: What problem do you have with Talos, stranger?

String.Source: Sorry, I'm not interested.
String.Dest: Sorry, I'm not interested.

String.Source: Your loss, hunter. But it doesn't matter. I have business with the innkeepers I must attend to.
String.Dest: Your loss, hunter. But it doesn't matter. I have business with the innkeepers I must attend to.

String.Source: What problem do you have with Talos, stranger?
String.Dest: What problem do you have with Talos, stranger?

String.Source: I was born in Morrowind, and through my veins flows the fire of the Red Mountain itself.
String.Dest: I was born in Morrowind, and through my veins flows the fire of the Red Mountain itself.

String.Source: What problem do you have with Talos, stranger?
String.Dest: What problem do you have with Talos, stranger?

String.Source: That fire burns with hatred for all who seek to destroy us. Whether it is the Dragon of the North or the dragons in the sky, they will all perish.
String.Dest: That fire burns with hatred for all who seek to destroy us. Whether it is the Dragon of the North or the dragons in the sky, they will all perish.

String.Source: Who are you? Why do you despise dragons?
String.Dest: Who are you? Why do you despise dragons?

String.Source: Agreed. Perhaps we should travel together.
String.Dest: Agreed. Perhaps we should travel together.

String.Source: In time, yes, but not now. I have a date with an innkeeper. Eight of them, in fact. Because chasing mammoths only gets you so far.
String.Dest: In time, yes, but not now. I have a date with an innkeeper. Eight of them, in fact. Because chasing mammoths only gets you so far.

String.Source: Who are you? Why do you despise dragons?
String.Dest: Who are you? Why do you despise dragons?

String.Source: My name is Meresine. I was born in Morrowind, and through my veins flows the fire of the Red Mountain itself.
String.Dest: My name is Meresine. I was born in Morrowind, and through my veins flows the fire of the Red Mountain itself.

String.Source: Who are you? Why do you despise dragons?
String.Dest: Who are you? Why do you despise dragons?

String.Source: That fire burns with hatred for all who seek to destroy us. Whether it is the Dragon of the North or the dragons in the sky, they will all perish.
String.Dest: That fire burns with hatred for all who seek to destroy us. Whether it is the Dragon of the North or the dragons in the sky, they will all perish.

String.Source: Talos wasn't a dragon. He was a man who apparently really hated snakes.
String.Dest: Talos wasn't a dragon. He was a man who apparently really hated snakes.

String.Source: Ah, the statue. I've heard people say the one at his feet isn't a snake, but another dragon. The God of Time itself, perhaps.
String.Dest: Ah, the statue. I've heard people say the one at his feet isn't a snake, but another dragon. The God of Time itself, perhaps.

String.Source: Talos wasn't a dragon. He was a man who apparently really hated snakes.
String.Dest: Talos wasn't a dragon. He was a man who apparently really hated snakes.

String.Source: Whether you're mortal or Divine, the rules are the same. Kill or be killed. Surrender or subjugate.
String.Dest: Whether you're mortal or Divine, the rules are the same. Kill or be killed. Surrender or subjugate.

String.Source: For your information, I wasn't praying to this fool. I was looting him.
String.Dest: For your information, I wasn't praying to this fool. I was looting him.

String.Source: Then you either think Talos a man, or you fear not his wrath. Either way, we're in agreement. He isn't worthy of anyone's respect.
String.Dest: Then you either think Talos a man, or you fear not his wrath. Either way, we're in agreement. He isn't worthy of anyone's respect.

String.Source: For your information, I wasn't praying to this fool. I was looting him.
String.Dest: For your information, I wasn't praying to this fool. I was looting him.

String.Source: Like all dragons, his legacy is that of murder and carnage.
String.Dest: Like all dragons, his legacy is that of murder and carnage.

String.Source: Dragon or mortal, free will allows us all to choose our destiny.
String.Dest: Dragon or mortal, free will allows us all to choose our destiny.

String.Source: You mean the illusion of free will. For there are only two kinds of choices in this world.
String.Dest: You mean the illusion of free will. For there are only two kinds of choices in this world.

String.Source: Dragon or mortal, free will allows us all to choose our destiny.
String.Dest: Dragon or mortal, free will allows us all to choose our destiny.

String.Source: Submitting to one's desires, or defying them.
String.Dest: Submitting to one's desires, or defying them.

String.Source: As a dragon myself, I don't disagree.
String.Dest: As a dragon myself, I don't disagree.

String.Source: And yet here you are submitting to another. One that isn't even alive.
String.Dest: And yet here you are submitting to another. One that isn't even alive.

String.Source: I've seen dragons, and I don't disagree.
String.Dest: I've seen dragons, and I don't disagree.

String.Source: And yet knowing this you still choose to submit to them. In this case, one that isn't even alive.
String.Dest: And yet knowing this you still choose to submit to them. In this case, one that isn't even alive.

String.Source: A dragon has no sympathy for mortals. Its very nature is to dominate.
String.Dest: A dragon has no sympathy for mortals. Its very nature is to dominate.

String.Source: You handle yourself well. I could use someone like you by my side.
String.Dest: You handle yourself well. I could use someone like you by my side.

String.Source: Ah, Giant slayer. How goes the hunt?
String.Dest: Ah, Giant slayer. How goes the hunt?

String.Source: What about the death of Ulfric? Does that change anything?
String.Dest: What about the death of Ulfric? Does that change anything?

String.Source: It only delays the inevitable. Brunwulf's authority is already weak. It's easy to champion the cause of justice when your throne is not at stake.
String.Dest: It only delays the inevitable. Brunwulf's authority is already weak. It's easy to champion the cause of justice when your throne is not at stake.

String.Source: What about the death of Ulfric? Does that change anything?
String.Dest: What about the death of Ulfric? Does that change anything?

String.Source: What if Ulfric was removed from power? Would that change anything?
String.Dest: What if Ulfric was removed from power? Would that change anything?

String.Source: It would only delay the inevitable. Whoever his replacement is would lack authority.
String.Dest: It would only delay the inevitable. Whoever his replacement is would lack authority.

String.Source: What about the death of Ulfric? Does that change anything?
String.Dest: What about the death of Ulfric? Does that change anything?

String.Source: What if Ulfric was removed from power? Would that change anything?
String.Dest: What if Ulfric was removed from power? Would that change anything?

String.Source: To keep his throne he will have to satisfy the demands of his people. And that's when he will turn on the Elves.
String.Dest: To keep his throne he will have to satisfy the demands of his people. And that's when he will turn on the Elves.

String.Source: If it's a such joke, why aren't you laughing?
String.Dest: If it's a such joke, why aren't you laughing?

String.Source: It's not that kind of joke, fool. This one has no punchline. It only ends in tears.
String.Dest: It's not that kind of joke, fool. This one has no punchline. It only ends in tears.

String.Source: You're right. Windhelm is a poor excuse for a city.
String.Dest: You're right. Windhelm is a poor excuse for a city.

String.Source: And every day the cracks in the walls grow deeper. Mark my words, this city is the next Helgen. Only it won't be dragonfire that burns it to ground.
String.Dest: And every day the cracks in the walls grow deeper. Mark my words, this city is the next Helgen. Only it won't be dragonfire that burns it to ground.

String.Source: Do you have a problem with coming back here?
String.Dest: Do you have a problem with coming back here?

String.Source: Not at all. Unlike a dragon, it's impossible for a person to stay angry at all times. That's why I'm glad you brought me. This city is my kindling.
String.Dest: Not at all. Unlike a dragon, it's impossible for a person to stay angry at all times. That's why I'm glad you brought me. This city is my kindling.

String.Source: Why do you come back then?
String.Dest: Why do you come back then?

String.Source: Unlike a dragon, it's impossible for a person to stay angry at all times. That's why I come back here. This city is my kindling.
String.Dest: Unlike a dragon, it's impossible for a person to stay angry at all times. That's why I come back here. This city is my kindling.

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Windhelm?
String.Dest: 你觉得风盔城怎么样?

String.Source: My thoughts are that nothing has changed since I left.
String.Dest: My thoughts are that nothing has changed since I left.

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Windhelm?
String.Dest: 你觉得风盔城怎么样?

String.Source: You lived in this city?
String.Dest: You lived in this city?

String.Source: I moved here from Morrowind ten years ago. Before I left, my fellow Dunmer warned me the only thing colder than Windhelm was its people.
String.Dest: I moved here from Morrowind ten years ago. Before I left, my fellow Dunmer warned me the only thing colder than Windhelm was its people.

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Windhelm?
String.Dest: 你觉得风盔城怎么样?

String.Source: You lived in this city?
String.Dest: You lived in this city?

String.Source: Hmph. Back then I didn't find it funny, but now I realize this entire city is a joke.
String.Dest: Hmph. Back then I didn't find it funny, but now I realize this entire city is a joke.

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Windhelm?
String.Dest: 你觉得风盔城怎么样?

String.Source: Why did you leave Morrowind?
String.Dest: Why did you leave Morrowind?

String.Source: That's not something I care to talk about.
String.Dest: That's not something I care to talk about.

String.Source: If you seek my aid, that's where our paths will cross.
String.Dest: If you seek my aid, that's where our paths will cross.

String.Source: Beyond that, you'll find me in the shadow of every dragon in this Gods forsaken land. All you have to do is listen for their screams.
String.Dest: Beyond that, you'll find me in the shadow of every dragon in this Gods forsaken land. All you have to do is listen for their screams.

String.Source: Damn! No sign of the dragon. The mammoths must be out grazing.
String.Dest: Damn! No sign of the dragon. The mammoths must be out grazing.

String.Source: Well, if I can't have a dragon, I'll settle for a Giant's head. Come on, let's kill these overgrown monkeys.
String.Dest: Well, if I can't have a dragon, I'll settle for a Giant's head. Come on, let's kill these overgrown monkeys.

String.Source: When they kneel before this altar, what they pray for is servitude.
String.Dest: When they kneel before this altar, what they pray for is servitude.

String.Source: I never understood why people pray to this man. The one they call the "Dragon of the North."
String.Dest: I never understood why people pray to this man. The one they call the "Dragon of the North."

String.Source: The Giant Camp is just east of the Shrine. You can smell the burnt skeever from here.
String.Dest: The Giant Camp is just east of the Shrine. You can smell the burnt skeever from here.

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下。

String.Source: Waiting.
String.Dest: 还在等。

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟我走。

String.Source: Following.
String.Dest: 我跟着。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Very well. I'll resume the hunt on my own.
String.Dest: Very well. I'll resume the hunt on my own.

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: So be it.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: It's nothing. Never mind.
String.Dest: 没什么事，不用担心。

String.Source: On second thought, I don't need anything.
String.Dest: 仔细考虑了一下，我不需要任何东西。

String.Source: Fine.
String.Dest: 好嘛。

String.Source: Yes. Let me show you.
String.Dest: 不错，你看看。

String.Source: Show me.
String.Dest: 让我看看。

String.Source: Still need something?
String.Dest: 你还需要什么吗？

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你为我做件事情。

String.Source: Say your piece.
String.Dest: Say your piece.

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你为我做件事情。

String.Source: Name your task.
String.Dest: 报告你的任务。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Keep it light. The one advantage we have is our speed.
String.Dest: Keep it light. The one advantage we have is our speed.

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Very well. Let's trade.
String.Dest: Very well. Let's trade.

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: All right. But don't make a habit of it.
String.Dest: All right. But don't make a habit of it.

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Fine. But this isn't the time or place to be swapping things.
String.Dest: Fine. But this isn't the time or place to be swapping things.

String.Source: Is that all?
String.Dest: 就这样？

String.Source: Impossible.
String.Dest: 不可能。

String.Source: I refuse.
String.Dest: I refuse.

String.Source: Fine.
String.Dest: 好嘛。

String.Source: What do you need?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: They say monsters grow bolder at night. Hmph. The only thing that grows is one's fear.
String.Dest: They say monsters grow bolder at night. Hmph. The only thing that grows is one's fear.

String.Source: Ugh. I despise early mornings.
String.Dest: Ugh. I despise early mornings.

String.Source: The dawn light is said to be the weakest. And yet it burns the brightest.
String.Dest: The dawn light is said to be the weakest. And yet it burns the brightest.

String.Source: Some say it's best to be calm before a battle. Don't listen to those fools. Let your blood boil.
String.Dest: Some say it's best to be calm before a battle. Don't listen to those fools. Let your blood boil.

String.Source: Remember, you don't have to follow the road. I like to forge my own path.
String.Dest: Remember, you don't have to follow the road. I like to forge my own path.

String.Source: Dragons don't leave tracks like other animals. But they do leave carnage.
String.Dest: Dragons don't leave tracks like other animals. But they do leave carnage.

String.Source: When a dragon comes for this city, everyone's first instinct will be to flee. But you can't outrun the sky.
String.Dest: When a dragon comes for this city, everyone's first instinct will be to flee. But you can't outrun the sky.

String.Source: The towns are filled with fools, who know naught but to go about their daily lives.
String.Dest: The towns are filled with fools, who know naught but to go about their daily lives.

String.Source: Even these primitive Nord cities have everything we need for the hunt. Food, lodging, goods, and rumors.
String.Dest: Even these primitive Nord cities have everything we need for the hunt. Food, lodging, goods, and rumors.

String.Source: In a city this big, you'll likely find all types of people. Choose your conversation partners carefully.
String.Dest: In a city this big, you'll likely find all types of people. Choose your conversation partners carefully.

String.Source: A store. Be sure to prepare well for the road ahead.
String.Dest: A store. Be sure to prepare well for the road ahead.

String.Source: The stores are good places to get poisons, temper materials, or enchantments. Seek every advantage you can get.
String.Dest: The stores are good places to get poisons, temper materials, or enchantments. Seek every advantage you can get.

String.Source: I imagine the life of a store owner has its own trials. And they are all meaningless.
String.Dest: I imagine the life of a store owner has its own trials. And they are all meaningless.

String.Source: There is no such thing as bad luck, only the ill prepared. So buy what you must. When opportunity comes, your choices here will bear fruit.
String.Dest: There is no such thing as bad luck, only the ill prepared. So buy what you must. When opportunity comes, your choices here will bear fruit.

String.Source: An inn. I suppose now's as good a time as any to rest.
String.Dest: An inn. I suppose now's as good a time as any to rest.

String.Source: Inns are a good place to meet other hunters, and the peddlers who arm them.
String.Dest: Inns are a good place to meet other hunters, and the peddlers who arm them.

String.Source: Watch your footing in these ice caves. One slip and you'll die nameless.
String.Dest: Watch your footing in these ice caves. One slip and you'll die nameless.

String.Source: Let's clear this place quickly. I despise being indoors.
String.Dest: Let's clear this place quickly. I despise being indoors.

String.Source: A dragon lair. Filthy nests are everywhere.
String.Dest: A dragon lair. Filthy nests are everywhere.

String.Source: Nord inns reek of mead and fish. I almost prefer ash.
String.Dest: Nord inns reek of mead and fish. I almost prefer ash.

String.Source: Treat every shadow as if death lurks inside it.
String.Dest: Treat every shadow as if death lurks inside it.

String.Source: Who knows what dangers lie in these places. Burn the path ahead of you, and make apologies after.
String.Dest: Who knows what dangers lie in these places. Burn the path ahead of you, and make apologies after.

String.Source: Some who journey to Skyrim complain of snow. That is because they have never seen ash.
String.Dest: Some who journey to Skyrim complain of snow. That is because they have never seen ash.

String.Source: In Morrowind, even the brightest days are shrouded in a storm of unbridled smoke.
String.Dest: In Morrowind, even the brightest days are shrouded in a storm of unbridled smoke.

String.Source: When the dragons come to Markarth, the peasants will flee to this keep.
String.Dest: When the dragons come to Markarth, the peasants will flee to this keep.

String.Source: Only when he sees how hungry they are, the Jarl will lock the doors and leave them to die.
String.Dest: Only when he sees how hungry they are, the Jarl will lock the doors and leave them to die.

String.Source: Riften. Barenziah herself used to play thief in this town. Of course, that was before the city burned to the ground.
String.Dest: Riften. Barenziah herself used to play thief in this town. Of course, that was before the city burned to the ground.

String.Source: The city as it stands is little more than fifty years old. Barely out of the ground. And yet it still smells rotten.
String.Dest: The city as it stands is little more than fifty years old. Barely out of the ground. And yet it still smells rotten.

String.Source: The old Jarl, Hosgunn Crossed-Daggers was a fat, bloated, pig of a Nord. And like his cousins, he roasted on the spit.
String.Dest: The old Jarl, Hosgunn Crossed-Daggers was a fat, bloated, pig of a Nord. And like his cousins, he roasted on the spit.

String.Source: It took five years to rebuild this hovel. It was better left to ash.
String.Dest: It took five years to rebuild this hovel. It was better left to ash.

String.Source: The Temple of Mara. To me, the marriage custom here seems like a grift. A way to peddle amulets to lonely fools.
String.Dest: The Temple of Mara. To me, the marriage custom here seems like a grift. A way to peddle amulets to lonely fools.

String.Source: Imagine what it was like when the Bretons first took this city. Not a trace of the Dwemer remained, not even their smell. Just cold, empty stone.
String.Dest: Imagine what it was like when the Bretons first took this city. Not a trace of the Dwemer remained, not even their smell. Just cold, empty stone.

String.Source: For all their pride, these Nords live in a city built by an Elven race.
String.Dest: For all their pride, these Nords live in a city built by an Elven race.

String.Source: A quarter century has passed since Ulfric took this city. That was the domino that started it all.
String.Dest: A quarter century has passed since Ulfric took this city. That was the domino that started it all.

String.Source: They say the Northern Dragon established a College here to train in the art of the shout. They must have converted it into that Dwemer museum.
String.Dest: They say the Northern Dragon established a College here to train in the art of the shout. They must have converted it into that Dwemer museum.

String.Source: As to why, your guess is as good as mine. There are no shortage of fools looking for power. Teachers, however, are another story.
String.Dest: As to why, your guess is as good as mine. There are no shortage of fools looking for power. Teachers, however, are another story.

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: Taste the bite of my arrow, vampire!
String.Dest: Taste the bite of my arrow, vampire!

String.Source: Pathetic.
String.Dest: Pathetic.

String.Source: All too easy.
String.Dest: All too easy.

String.Source: Not even worth mentioning.
String.Dest: Not even worth mentioning.

String.Source: Didn't even break a sweat.
String.Dest: Didn't even break a sweat.

String.Source: All too easy.
String.Dest: All too easy.

String.Source: Burn in Oblivion, all of you.
String.Dest: Burn in Oblivion, all of you.

String.Source: So we managed to survive. Hmph. It seems destiny demands we live to see another day.
String.Dest: So we managed to survive. Hmph. It seems destiny demands we live to see another day.

String.Source: That fight didn't go smoothly. We obviously didn't prepare enough.
String.Dest: That fight didn't go smoothly. We obviously didn't prepare enough.

String.Source: That wasn't a fight, it was a slaughter.
String.Dest: That wasn't a fight, it was a slaughter.

String.Source: What a joke.
String.Dest: What a joke.

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: Lead then, and I will drown the fires in blood.
String.Dest: Lead then, and I will drown the fires in blood.

String.Source: Death to dragons.
String.Dest: Death to dragons.

String.Source: Turn all your enemies to ash.
String.Dest: Turn all your enemies to ash.

String.Source: As you will.
String.Dest: 如你所愿。

String.Source: Nerevar guide us.
String.Dest: Nerevar guide us.

String.Source: If we die, we die fighting.
String.Dest: If we die, we die fighting.

String.Source: Watch the skies, traveler.
String.Dest: Watch the skies, traveler.

String.Source: Blood and fire, fire and blood.
String.Dest: Blood and fire, fire and blood.

String.Source: Like the Foyadas of the Red Mountain, fire runs through our veins.
String.Dest: Like the Foyadas of the Red Mountain, fire runs through our veins.

String.Source: Those born in the fire are forged by it.
String.Dest: Those born in the fire are forged by it.

String.Source: No Dragon can withstand the fire of the Red Mountain. Let us douse them all in our flame.
String.Dest: No Dragon can withstand the fire of the Red Mountain. Let us douse them all in our flame.

String.Source: We've stopped. What's wrong?
String.Dest: We've stopped. What's wrong?

String.Source: What now?
String.Dest: 又怎么了？

String.Source: These caves run dark and deep. Watch yourself.
String.Dest: These caves run dark and deep. Watch yourself.

String.Source: What is it?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: Speak. Waste not what little time this world has left.
String.Dest: Speak. Waste not what little time this world has left.
